humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of four sentinel lymph nodes is involved by metastatic carcinoma (1/4). Based on the AJCC staging system, this corresponds to N1. The report also mentions that there are no metastases in in-transit, satellite, or micrometastases lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for cancer is determined by the involvement of lymph nodes. In this report, it is stated that one out of four sentinel lymph nodes is involved by carcinoma (1/4). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.
